item.title: 澳大利亚总理：中国海军受伤潜水员事件“危险”
item.description:
Australia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said a Chinese warship acted in a dangerous manner during an incident with an Australian navy vessel that injured a military diver, his first comments on the matter which he said had damaged ties.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内斯表示，一艘中国军舰在与一艘澳大利亚海军舰艇发生的事件中采取了危险的行为，导致一名军事潜水员受伤，这是他对此事的首次评论，他称这损害了两国关系。

HMAS Toowoomba - a long-range frigate - was conducting a diving operation in Japan's Exclusive Economic Zone on Nov. 14 to clear fishing nets from its propellers when the incident occurred, Defence Minister Richard Marles said on Saturday.翻译:日本国防部长理查德·马勒斯周六表示，11 月 14 日，英国皇家海军图文巴号远程护卫舰正在日本专属经济区进行潜水作业，以清除螺旋桨上的渔网。

Albanese, who met briefly with Chinese president Xi Jinping on the sidelines of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum in San Francisco last week, has come under domestic political pressure over whether he raised the matter with the Chinese leader.翻译:阿尔巴内塞上周在旧金山举行的亚太经合组织(APEC)论坛期间与中国国家主席习近平进行了短暂会面，他因是否向中国领导人提出此事而面临国内政治压力。

In an interview on Monday with Sky News Australia, Albanese said the incident hurt one person and showed the need for "communication guardrails" between militaries.翻译:阿尔巴内斯周一在接受澳大利亚天空新闻采访时表示，这一事件造成一人受伤，并表明军队之间需要建立“通讯护栏”。

"This was dangerous, it was unsafe and unprofessional from the Chinese warship," he said.翻译:他说：“中国军舰这样做很危险、不安全、不专业。”

Albanese said the incident was raised through "all of the normal channels", but didn't disclose if it was discussed in his private meeting with Xi at APEC.翻译:阿尔巴内塞表示，这一事件是通过“所有正常渠道”提出的，但没有透露他在亚太经合组织与习近平的私人会晤中是否讨论过此事。

"The consequences of these events are that they do damage to the relationship. And this certainly is an event that does do damage. And we've made that very clear to China," he added.翻译:“这些事件的后果是它们确实损害了两国关系。这肯定是一个确实造成损害的事件。我们已经向中国明确表示了这一点，”他补充道。

A People's Liberation Army Navy destroyer closed towards HMAS Toowoomba, despite the Australian vessel notifying the Chinese warship of a diving operation, and operated its hull-mounted sonar in a manner that posed a safety risk, Marles previously said.翻译:马尔斯此前表示，尽管澳大利亚军舰通知中国军舰进行了潜水行动，一艘中国人民解放军海军驱逐舰仍接近图文巴号，并以构成安全风险的方式操作其船体声纳。

Medical assessments found minor injuries to divers likely caused by the destroyer's sonar, the defence minister added.翻译:国防部长补充说，医疗评估发现潜水员受轻伤可能是由驱逐舰的声纳造成的。

China's defence ministry responded on Monday saying that Australia's remarks were inconsistent with the facts and Beijing had lodged complaint to Canberra.翻译:中国国防部周一回应称，澳大利亚的言论与事实不符，北京已向堪培拉提出投诉。

The Chinese destroyer Ningbo monitored and identified HMAS Toowoomba, all while keeping a safe distance from it and did not carry out any activities that might affect the diving operations of the Australian side, the ministry said in a statement.翻译:中国海军“宁波”号驱逐舰对“图文巴”号舰进行了监视和识别，并与其保持安全距离，没有进行任何可能影响澳方潜水作业的活动。

"We urge the Australian side to respect the facts and stop making reckless and irresponsible accusations against China," it said.翻译:我们敦促澳方尊重事实，停止对中方进行无端、不负责任的指责。

Albanese visited China this month, the first Australian leader to do so in seven years, agreeing to restart an annual leaders' dialogue.翻译:阿尔巴内斯本月访问中国，这是七年来第一位访问中国的澳大利亚领导人，并同意重启年度领导人对话。

China's embassy in Australia referred to comments by China's foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning at a regular media briefing in Beijing on Monday, that China's military "is always highly disciplined and conducts professional operations in accordance with international law and international practice".翻译:中国驻澳大利亚大使馆援引中国外交部发言人毛宁周一在北京举行的例行媒体吹风会上的言论，称中国军队“纪律严明，按照国际法和国际惯例开展专业行动”。

"We hope the relevant party will stop stirring up trouble at China's doorstep and work with us to jointly sustain the momentum of the improvement and development of China-Australia relations," she added.翻译:希望有关方面停止在中方家门口兴风作浪，与我们共同努力，维护中澳关系改善发展势头。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham; Additional reporting by Bernard Orr and Ethan Wang in Beijing; Editing by Lincoln Feast, Bernadette Baum and Alex Richardson翻译:科斯蒂·李约瑟报道； Bernard Orr 和 Ethan Wang 在北京的补充报道；编辑：Lincoln Feast、Bernadette Baum 和 Alex Richardson

item.title: 小米第三季度净利润因成本节省而大幅增长，收入增加
item.description:
Smartphone maker Xiaomi Corp (1810.HK) posted a forecast-beating jump in third-quarter net income on Monday, while revenue also topped estimates as flat device shipments outperformed the wider market.翻译:智能手机制造商小米公司（1810.HK）周一公布第三季度净利润增长超预期，而由于平板设备出货量跑赢大盘，营收也超出预期。

The company's sales for the period totalled 70.9 billion yuan ($9.83 billion), beating an average estimate of 70.2 billion yuan from 13 analysts polled by LSEG.翻译:该公司当期销售额总计 709 亿元人民币（合 98.3 亿美元），超过 LSEG 调查的 13 名分析师平均预期的 702 亿元人民币。

Net income jumped by 183% from a year earlier to 6 billion yuan thanks to lower component costs and efficiencies across the business, compared to a consensus estimate of 4.6 billion yuan.翻译:由于零部件成本降低和整个业务效率提高，净利润较上年同期跃升 183% 至 60 亿元人民币，而市场普遍预期为 46 亿元人民币。

"While we did not encounter many positive external factors, the achievements we were still able to make demonstrate an improvement in our overall capabilities," Xiaomi President Lu Weibing said on an earnings call.翻译:小米总裁卢伟冰在财报电话会议上表示：“虽然我们没有遇到太多积极的外部因素，但我们仍然能够取得的成绩表明我们整体能力的提高。”

Xiaomi, China's fifth-largest smartphone brand, shipped 9.1 million devices in China during the latest quarter, according to industry research firm Canalys.翻译:根据行业研究公司 Canalys 的数据，中国第五大智能手机品牌小米最近一个季度在中国的设备出货量为 910 万部。

Though that was little changed from a year earlier, Xiaomi outperformed peers, with overall industry sales dropping 5% year on year, according to Canalys.翻译:Canalys 的数据显示，尽管与去年同期相比变化不大，但小米的表现优于同行，行业整体销售额同比下降 5%。

Demand in the world's biggest smartphone market has long been in decline, with the COVID-19 pandemic and then a weak economy persuading customers to wait longer before upgrading their phones.翻译:全球最大智能手机市场的需求长期以来一直在下降，原因是新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行以及随后的经济疲软迫使客户在升级手机之前等待更长时间。

But there have long some signs of recovery, including Xiaomi's sales of more than 1 million units of its latest flagship smartphone in the week since its launch.翻译:但长期以来已经出现了一些复苏的迹象，包括小米最新旗舰智能手机自推出以来的一周内销量超过 100 万部。

Xiaomi investors are also focused on signs of progress for its new electric vehicle division.翻译:小米投资者还关注其新电动汽车部门的进展迹象。

Last week, a unit of Beijing-based automaker BAIC Group applied to regulators for approval to manufacture two electric vehicle models under the Xiaomi brand name in a sign that production may start soon.翻译:上周，北京汽车制造商北汽集团旗下子公司向监管机构申请批准生产两款小米品牌电动汽车，这表明生产可能很快就会开始。

Xiaomi's Lu reaffirmed its goal of mass producing vehicles in the first half of 2024 during the earnings call and signalled continued investment in the vehicle business, with car-related R&D personnel reaching 3,000 by the end of September.翻译:小米集团董事长卢勇在财报电话会议上重申了2024年上半年量产汽车的目标，并表示将继续投资汽车业务，到9月底汽车相关研发人员将达到3000人。

($1 = 7.2111 Chinese yuan)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2111 人民币）

Reporting by Yelin Mo in Beijing and Brenda Goh in Shanghai; Editing by Jacqueline Wong, David Goodman and Jan Harvey翻译:莫叶琳北京报道、布兰达吴上海报道；编辑：Jacqueline Wong、David Goodman 和 Jan Harvey

item.title: 习近平告诉马克龙，中国希望法国企业增加投资
item.description:
China wants more French companies to invest in the country and hopes France will provide a fair and non-discriminatory business environment for Chinese firms, President Xi Jinping said on Monday.翻译:习近平主席周一表示，中方希望更多法国企业来华投资，并希望法国为中国企业提供公平、非歧视的营商环境。

Xi made the comments in a phone call with French President Emmanuel Macron, Chinese state television reported, fortifying ties with its European trading partner after Macron visited China in April.翻译:据中国国家电视台报道，习近平在与法国总统马克龙的电话中发表了上述言论，在马克龙四月份访问中国后加强了与欧洲贸易伙伴的关系。

China faces an electric vehicle subsidy investigation by the European Union and a looming probe into its steelmakers. Meanwhile, several European countries have complained about China's opaque laws and rules regarding foreign companies in the country.翻译:中国面临欧盟的电动汽车补贴调查以及即将对其钢铁制造商进行的调查。与此同时，一些欧洲国家抱怨中国针对在华外国公司的不透明法律和规定。

"China is willing to maintain high-level exchanges with the French side," Xi said, adding that he welcomed more French products entering the Chinese market.翻译:中方愿同法方保持高层交往，欢迎更多法国产品进入中国市场。

Xi also said China was willing to strengthen cooperation with France at the United Nations and other multilateral institutions. China took over the presidency of the U.N. Security Council (UNSC) this month.翻译:习近平还表示，中方愿同法方加强在联合国等多边机构中的合作。中国本月接任联合国安理会主席。

The leader of the world's second-largest economy also called on France to play a constructive role in promoting the positive development of China-EU relations, as ties have been strained over issues ranging from the EU's push to reduce supply chain reliance on China to the war in Ukraine.翻译:这位世界第二大经济体的领导人还呼吁法国在推动中欧关系积极发展方面发挥建设性作用，因为中欧关系因欧盟推动减少供应链对中国的依赖等问题而变得紧张。乌克兰战争。

"China and the European Union should remain partners for mutually beneficial cooperation," Xi said in the call.翻译:习近平在通话中表示，“中国和欧盟要继续做互利合作的伙伴”。

The two leaders also exchanged views on the conflict in Gaza, and agreed that it was imperative to avoid a further deterioration of the situation, in particular an even more serious humanitarian crisis, state television reported.翻译:据国家电视台报道，两位领导人还就加沙冲突交换了意见，一致认为必须避免局势进一步恶化，特别是避免更加严重的人道主义危机。

Reporting by Ethan Wang and Bernard Orr; Editing by Toby Chopra and Alex Richardson翻译:Ethan Wang 和 Bernard Orr 报道；托比·乔普拉和亚历克斯·理查森编辑

item.title: 中国重申支持新国家加入金砖国家，阿根廷表示拒绝
item.description:
China reaffirmed its support on Monday for new countries joining the BRICS grouping of developing nations, even as Argentina's likely next foreign minister was quoted as saying that her country would no longer do so.翻译:中国周一重申支持新国家加入金砖国家集团，尽管阿根廷可能的下一任外交部长表示，她的国家将不再这样做。

Argentina was among six countries invited to become new members of the BRICS at a summit held in South Africa in August, part of the grouping's push to reshuffle a Western-dominated world order it sees as outdated.翻译:8月在南非举行的一次峰会上，阿根廷是受邀成为金砖国家新成员的六个国家之一，这是金砖国家推动重新洗牌其认为已经过时的西方主导世界秩序的一部分。

However, Russia's RIA news agency cited Diana Mondino, an economist tipped to become foreign minister in the administration of Argentina's newly-elected Javier Milei, as saying that her country would not now join the BRICS group.翻译:然而，俄罗斯通讯社援引经济学家戴安娜·蒙迪诺的话称，阿根廷现在不会加入金砖国家。蒙迪诺有望成为阿根廷新当选的哈维尔·米莱政府的外交部长。

Mao Ning, a Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson, told a press briefing that she was not aware of Mondino's reported comments.翻译:中国外交部发言人毛宁在新闻发布会上表示，她不了解蒙迪诺的言论报道。

"What I want to say is that the BRICS cooperation mechanism is an important platform for emerging markets and developing countries to strengthen solidarity and cooperation and uphold common interests," Mao said.翻译:毛泽东说：“我想说的是，金砖国家合作机制是新兴市场国家和发展中国家加强团结合作、维护共同利益的重要平台。”

"BRICS is also an open platform and we welcome any interested country to become a member of the BRICS family."翻译:“金砖国家也是一个开放的平台，我们欢迎任何有兴趣的国家成为金砖国家大家庭的一员。”

Milei, a right-wing libertarian who has sharply criticised China and the China-led BRICS group, was elected Argentina's new president on Sunday.翻译:曾尖锐批评中国和中国领导的金砖国家的右翼自由主义者米雷周日当选阿根廷新总统。

Milei and Mondino had both opposed Argentina joining the bloc, which also includes Brazil, Russia, India and South Africa.翻译:米莱和蒙迪诺都反对阿根廷加入该集团，该集团还包括巴西、俄罗斯、印度和南非。

"We don't understand what the benefit (of joining BRICS) is for Argentina at the moment. If it later turns out that there is a benefit, we will analyze it," she told the RIA news agency.翻译:“我们目前不明白（加入金砖国家）对阿根廷有什么好处。如果后来证明有好处，我们会分析它，”她告诉俄新社。

China and Russia are pushing for the expansion of the BRICS grouping as they seek to counter Western economic dominance.翻译:中国和俄罗斯正在推动金砖国家集团的扩张，以对抗西方的经济主导地位。

Saudi Arabia, Iran, Ethiopia, Egypt and the United Arab Emirates are the other five countries invited at the August summit to join the BRICS grouping.翻译:沙特阿拉伯、伊朗、埃塞俄比亚、埃及和阿拉伯联合酋长国是八月份峰会上受邀加入金砖国家集团的另外五个国家。

Reporting by Liz Lee and Ethan Wang Editing by Gareth Jones翻译:Liz Lee 和 Ethan Wang 报道 Gareth Jones 编辑

item.title: 尽管经济不利，汇丰仍有望实现中国财富招聘目标
item.description:
HSBC (HSBA.L) is on track to meet a target of expanding its China wealth business headcount to 3,000 by 2025, despite the country's current economic headwinds, as it bets on a steadily rising number of the extremely affluent, a senior executive said.翻译:汇丰银行(HSBA.L)一位高级管理人员表示，尽管中国目前面临经济逆风，但汇丰银行 (HSBA.L) 仍有望实现到 2025 年将其中国财富业务员工人数扩大到 3,000 人的目标，因为该行押注于极度富裕人群的数量稳步增长。

The Asia-focused bank has recruited around 1,500 wealth managers in the world's second-largest economy since 2021, Trista Sun, HSBC China head of wealth and personal banking, told Reuters.翻译:汇丰银行中国财富及个人银行业务主管孙翠斯塔 (Trista Sun) 告诉路透社，自 2021 年以来，这家专注于亚洲的银行已在全球第二大经济体招募了约 1,500 名财富经理。

The expansion of the China wealth advisory team serves HSBC's digital-focused "Pinnacle" strategy, part of a pivot towards Asia with $3.5 billion worth of investments committed to the region in 2021.翻译:中国财富咨询团队的扩张服务于汇丰银行以数字化为重点的“Pinnacle”战略，这是汇丰银行转向亚洲战略的一部分，汇丰银行承诺于 2021 年向该地区投资 35 亿美元。

The growing headcount is in addition to wealth advisory staff in HSBC's Chinese branches, Sun said. Most foreign banks still rely on in-branch wealth planners to serve clients in China.翻译:孙说，除了汇丰银行中国分行的财富顾问人员之外，员工人数也在不断增加。大多数外资银行仍然依赖分行内的理财规划师为中国客户提供服务。

HSBC is pressing ahead with the hiring plan as China's wealth and insurance sector is expanding faster than the country's economy is expected to, she added.翻译:她补充说，由于中国财富和保险业的扩张速度快于该国经济的预期，汇丰银行正在推进招聘计划。

The bank estimates that China's household wealth will increase by around 8.5% a year over a five-year period starting 2022, outpacing Beijing's around-5% annual target for 2023 economic growth which many fear will be a struggle to reach.翻译:该银行估计，从 2022 年开始的五年内，中国家庭财富将每年增长 8.5% 左右，超过北京设定的 2023 年经济增长 5% 左右的年度目标，许多人担心这一目标将难以实现。

Under Pinnacle, HSBC runs an insurance brokerage unit which in September became the first qualified foreign-owned broker to distribute mutual funds locally.翻译:汇丰银行在 Pinnacle 旗下运营着一个保险经纪部门，该部门于 9 月成为第一家在当地分销共同基金的合格外资经纪商。

The bank's targeted wealth clientele - adults with a net worth of at least $250,000 - is expected to double to 350 million by 2030 in China, the bank estimates.翻译:该银行估计，到 2030 年，该银行的目标财富客户（净资产至少为 25 万美元的成年人）预计将在中国翻一番，达到 3.5 亿。

A weaker Chinese yuan has bolstered demand for offshore investment options, with Sun pointing to the quota-based Qualified Domestic Institutional Investors programme (QDII) and Wealth Management Connect scheme covering China's wealthy Greater Bay Area as investors seek "exposure to the international market".翻译:人民币贬值提振了对离岸投资选择的需求，孙指出，随着投资者寻求“接触国际市场”，基于配额的合格境内机构投资者计划（QDII）和覆盖中国富裕的大湾区的理财通计划。

The London-headquartered bank has expanded its QDII offer with the acquisition of Citigroup's (C.N) China consumer wealth management business in October this year, Sun said.翻译:孙表示，这家总部位于伦敦的银行今年 10 月收购了花旗集团的中国消费者财富管理业务，扩大了 QDII 业务。

(This story has been corrected to change the year to 2021, from 2011, in paragraph 2)翻译:（这个故事已更正，将第 2 段中的年份从 2011 年更改为 2021 年）

item.title: 缅甸军政府的统治是否受到威胁？
item.description:
Myanmar's ruling military is facing attacks on multiple fronts in its borderlands as an alliance of ethnic minority insurgent groups combines with pro-democracy fighters to try to capture territory and challenge the junta's rule.

WHY HAS FIGHTING ERUPTED?

On Oct. 27, an alliance of ethnic minority groups launched coordinated attacks on military posts in northern Shan State bordering China and took several towns, in an operation they called 1027, referring to the date the assault began.翻译:10 月 27 日，一个少数民族联盟对与中国接壤的掸邦北部的军事哨所发动了协调一致的袭击，并占领了几个城镇，他们将这次行动称为“1027”，指的是袭击开始的日期。

The "Three Brotherhood Alliance", as the group is known, said its objective was "to safeguard the lives of civilians, assert our right to self defence, maintain control over our territory and respond resolutely to ongoing artillery attacks and airstrikes" by the junta.翻译:该组织称“三兄弟联盟”，其目标是“保护平民的生命，维护我们的自卫权，保持对我们领土的控制，并坚决应对军政府正在进行的炮击和空袭” 。

It was also "dedicated to eradicating the oppressive military dictatorship", it said, and committed to combating online gambling scam centres on the Myanmar-China border, which involve thousands of foreign workers, many against their will.翻译:它还“致力于消除压迫性的军事独裁统治”，并表示致力于打击中缅边境的在线赌博诈骗中心，该中心涉及数千名外国工人，其中许多是违背他们意愿的。

China, which has significant influence in the area, has urged an end to the fighting and had been pressing the junta to break up illicit businesses that have made many Chinese victims of scams, some even slavery. Some analysts and diplomats say it is unlikely the 1027 offensive could have been carried out without China's blessing.

WHY WAS OPERATION 1027 SIGNIFICANT?

Though fighting has raged in multiple regions of Myanmar since the generals seized power in a 2021 coup, the scale of the new offensive represents the biggest military challenge to the junta's rule, stretching its forces on several fronts.翻译:尽管自 2021 年将军们在政变中夺取政权以来，缅甸多个地区战事不断，但新攻势的规模是对军政府统治的最大军事挑战，在多个战线上拉伸了军政府的力量。

The alliance comprises three groups with extensive fighting experience - the Myanmar National Democratic Alliance Army (MNDAA) the Ta'ang National Liberation Army (TNLA) and the Arakan Army (AA).翻译:该联盟由三个具有丰富战斗经验的团体组成：缅甸民族民主联盟军（MNDAA）、德昂民族解放军（TNLA）和若开军（AA）。

Importantly, they were joined also by members of so-called people's defence forces, a loosely organised movement backed by Myanmar's parallel, National Unity Government (NUG). This indicates a level of planning and coordination not seen since the coup, with militias also assisting by thwarting the military's resupply efforts.翻译:重要的是，所谓的人民国防军成员也加入了他们的行列，这是一个由缅甸并行的民族团结政府（NUG）支持的组织松散的运动。这表明了自政变以来从未见过的规划和协调水平，民兵还通过阻挠军方的补给工作来提供协助。

The attacks in Shan State were followed by the AA opening a front against the military in its base of Rakhine State, despite a ceasefire agreed a year ago, with attacks by insurgents in Kayah state bordering Thailand, and the Sagaing region and Chin State, bordering India.

HOW SERIOUS A THREAT IS THE JUNTA FACING?

It is too soon to predict the extent to which the military's rule in the rest of the country could be under threat, analysts say.翻译:分析人士表示，现在预测军方在该国其他地区的统治可能受到多大程度的威胁还为时过早。

Generals have run Myanmar for five of the past six decades and have a track record of combining battlefield might with divide-and-rule strategies to control from the centre and keep in check formidable borderland rebellions.翻译:过去六十年中，将军们统治缅甸有五年，并拥有将战场力量与分而治之战略相结合的记录，以从中央进行控制并遏制强大的边境叛乱。

But the 1027 offensive has given a black eye to a well-equipped military with decades of experience fighting insurgencies.翻译:但1027攻势却让一支装备精良、拥有数十年打击叛乱经验的军队蒙羞。

There are signs it is emboldening the armed opposition, with rebels testing security forces for vulnerabilities in several regions, exploiting the junta's slow response and the ease with which its troops ceded dozens of posts and allowed small arms, ammunition, machine guns and even armoured vehicles to be seized.翻译:有迹象表明，它正在助长武装反对派的胆量，叛乱分子利用军政府反应迟缓以及军政府轻易放弃数十个哨所并允许携带小武器、弹药、机枪甚至装甲车的机会，在多个地区测试安全部队的弱点。被扣押。

The operation has been cheered around Myanmar and closely watched on social media, challenging military narratives of its invincibility. The reclusive junta has had no choice but to concede it is being tested, with an admission by its appointed president that the country was at risk of breaking apart.

WHAT IS LIKELY TO HAPPEN?

With its reputation at stake, the junta is unlikely to concede easily and risk a domino effect of challenges to its authority in more regions of a country where its rule is deeply unpopular.翻译:由于声誉受到威胁，军政府不太可能轻易让步，并冒着在其统治极不受欢迎的国家更多地区面临其权威受到挑战的多米诺骨牌效应的风险。

The military has superior firepower and resources, including air assets and artillery, and may try to mount a decisive response to crush the rebellion.翻译:军方拥有优越的火力和资源，包括空中资产和火炮，可能会尝试采取果断反应镇压叛乱。

A big decision for the military will be where it deploys its assets and carries out air strikes. Security forces are already stretched by the extensive armed opposition and a strong response on one front could expose the military elsewhere.翻译:军方的一个重大决定将是在哪里部署资产并进行空袭。安全部队已经因广泛的武装反对派而捉襟见肘，在某一方面的强烈反应可能会使军队在其他方面暴露出来。

Prolonged fighting will test the staying power and arsenals of both sides. A likely scenario would be the junta losing control of some border regions, though remaining in power centrally, an outcome that would be favourable to neighbours India, Thailand and China, which are concerned about instability and the prospect of a refugee crisis.翻译:长时间的战斗将考验双方的持久力和武库。一种可能的情况是军政府失去对一些边境地区的控制，但仍然集中掌权，这一结果将有利于邻国印度、泰国和中国，因为这些国家担心不稳定和难民危机的前景。

item.title: 英伟达的人工智能影响力再次推动业绩，华尔街寻求中国澄清
item.description:
Artificial intelligence chip leader Nvidia (NVDA.O) will likely deliver yet another blockbuster revenue forecast on Tuesday. But the real focus will be on whether widening U.S. curbs on sales of its high-end chips to China could hamper that run.翻译:人工智能芯片领导者英伟达（NVDA.O）可能会在周二发布另一个重磅收入预测。但真正的焦点将在于美国扩大对中国高端芯片销售的限制是否会阻碍这一趋势。

The results will also be a major test for the AI-powered rally that has helped drive up the U.S. stock market this year, with the Philadelphia semiconductor index (.SOX) up nearly 50% in 2023.翻译:这一结果也将是对人工智能驱动的涨势的重大考验，人工智能推动了今年美国股市的上涨，费城半导体指数（.SOX）在 2023 年上涨了近 50%。

"There is an underlying assumption that Nvidia has total market dominance ... so anything that affects that perception, whether it be because of the business performance or because of risks to certain markets, that is going to temper enthusiasm," Capital.com analyst Kyle Rodda said.翻译:Capital.com 分析师表示：“有一个基本假设，即英伟达拥有全面的市场主导地位……因此，任何影响这种看法的因素，无论是因为业务表现还是因为某些市场面临的风险，都会削弱人们的热情。”凯尔·罗达说道。

The Biden administration last month banned China sales of the H800 and A800 chips that Nvidia had created after previous curbs on exports to the country. China is the company's third-largest market and accounts for more than one-fifth of its revenue.翻译:拜登政府上个月禁止在中国销售英伟达在此前限制对华出口后生产的 H800 和 A800 芯片。中国是该公司的第三大市场，占其收入的五分之一以上。

Nvidia has said it does not expect any impact from the curbs in the near term. But its stock hit a near five-month low in October after a report by the Wall Street Journal said that up to $5 billion in Chinese orders were in jeopardy.翻译:英伟达表示，预计短期内不会受到限制措施的影响。但在《华尔街日报》报道称高达 50 亿美元的中国订单面临风险后，该公司股价在 10 月份跌至近五个月低点。

After a meteoric rally earlier this year that made it the first trillion-dollar chip firm, Nvidia's stock declined more than 12% between August and October, signaling investors were getting harder to impress as the China concerns mount.翻译:今年早些时候，英伟达股价迅速上涨，成为第一家价值数万亿美元的芯片公司，但随后该公司的股价在 8 月至 10 月期间下跌了 12% 以上，这表明随着对中国的担忧加剧，投资者越来越难以给投资者留下深刻印象。

Nvidia currently trades at 31 times its 12-month forward earnings estimates, compared with rival AMD's price-to-earnings ratio of 33.

CHINA CHIPS

Before the latest China export curbs, demand for Nvidia's H800 chip, a slower version of its flagship AI chip, had outpaced rivals as it was better than the alternatives.翻译:在中国实施最新的出口限制之前，对英伟达 H800 芯片（其旗舰人工智能芯片的较慢版本）的需求已经超过了竞争对手，因为它比其他替代品更好。

Analysts have said the chip designer has now come up with three chips for the Chinese market and plans to release them soon.翻译:分析师表示，该芯片设计商现已为中国市场推出了三款芯片，并计划很快发布。

"While the prior workarounds required only small changes to the memory bandwidth of the parts, this time around, the nature of the controls forces a sharp reduction in overall performance," Bernstein analyst Stacy Rasgon said in a note this month.翻译:Bernstein 分析师 Stacy Rasgon 在本月的一份报告中表示：“虽然之前的解决方法只需要对部件的内存带宽进行很小的改变，但这一次，控制的性质迫使整体性能急剧下降。”

"However, they may still be attractive to Chinese customers, while being more palatable to U.S. regulators."翻译:“然而，它们可能仍然对中国客户有吸引力，同时更容易受到美国监管机构的欢迎。”

Nvidia is expected to report a nearly 173% jump in revenue for the third quarter, according to analysts polled by LSEG.翻译:伦敦证券交易所集团 (LSEG) 调查的分析师表示，预计英伟达第三季度收入将增长近 173%。

Wall Street estimates it will forecast an over 195% rise in revenue for the current quarter.翻译:华尔街预计本季度收入将增长 195% 以上。

The company has also introduced a new top-of-the-line chip for AI called the H200, which comes with higher bandwidth memory and could help maintain its lead over AMD, competing with its upcoming MI300 chip.翻译:该公司还推出了一款名为 H200 的新型人工智能顶级芯片，该芯片具有更高的带宽内存，可帮助保持其对 AMD 的领先地位，与即将推出的 MI300 芯片竞争。

Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure will be among the first cloud service providers to offer access to H200 chips, in addition to specialty AI cloud providers CoreWeave, Lambda and Vultr.翻译:除了专业人工智能云提供商 CoreWeave、Lambda 和 Vultr 之外，亚马逊网络服务、谷歌云、微软 Azure 和甲骨文云基础设施将成为首批提供 H200 芯片访问权限的云服务提供商。

"It's possible Nvidia's massive growth will make revenue from China less material over time," Morningstar analysts said.翻译:晨星分析师表示：“随着时间的推移，英伟达的大幅增长可能会使来自中国的收入减少。”

Reporting by Arsheeya Bajwa and Chavi Mehta in Bengaluru; Editing by Devika Syamnath翻译:Arsheeya Bajwa 和 Chavi Mehta 在班加罗尔的报道；编辑：德维卡·萨姆纳特

item.title: 早盘竞价：人工智能和石油的感恩节开胃菜
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan.翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。

Thanksgiving may make for a clipped U.S. markets week, but there's plenty to chew on around the world before then - and a feast of intrigue in the artificial intelligence space.翻译:感恩节可能会让美国市场变得短暂，但在此之前，世界各地还有很多值得思考的事情——以及人工智能领域的一场阴谋盛宴。

Boardroom shenanigans at ChatGPT-developer OpenAI, where former boss Sam Altman was ousted on Friday and then hired by the firm's biggest backer Microsoft (MSFT.O), raises interesting questions about the pace of AI development.翻译:ChatGPT 开发商 OpenAI的董事会恶作剧，其前任老板 Sam Altman 于周五被罢免，然后被该公司最大的支持者微软(MSFT.O)聘用，引发了有关人工智能发展速度的有趣问题。

A key catalyst for some of the outsize Big Tech share gains this year, the craze around generative AI will also top the agenda as chip giant Nvidia (NVDA.O) reports earnings on Tuesday that will hold a light to a more than trebling of stock this year.翻译:作为今年一些大型科技股大幅上涨的关键催化剂，围绕生成人工智能的热潮也将成为首要议程，因为芯片巨头英伟达(NVDA.O)周二公布财报，该财报将使股价上涨逾三倍今年。

The macro week is partly shaped by the OPEC+ meeting on Nov. 26 amid reports the cartel may consider more oil output cuts to shore up recently plunging crude prices.翻译:宏观经济周在一定程度上受到 11 月 26 日OPEC+会议的影响，有报道称该组织可能会考虑进一步削减石油产量，以支撑最近暴跌的原油价格。

The failure of OPEC+ to buoy oil prices this year shows how much falling global demand is starting to shape prices and how much booming U.S. production is dominating the picture.翻译:欧佩克+今年未能提振油价，这表明全球需求下降正在多大程度地开始影响油价，以及美国产量的繁荣在多大程度上主导了局势。

After plummeting almost 25% in six weeks, U.S. crude prices have backed up a bit after the Reuters report on possible cuts on Friday and held steady about $76 per barrel first thing.翻译:在六周内暴跌近 25% 后，周五路透社报道可能减产后，美国原油价格略有回升，并稳定在每桶 76 美元左右。

That's also drawn a line for now under the recent slide in U.S. Treasury yields , which also bounced on Friday and were propped further by both Federal Reserve hawkishness and unexpected housing starts data from last month.翻译:这也暂时限制了美国国债收益率近期的下滑，美国国债收益率也在周五反弹，并受到美联储强硬态度和上个月意外的新屋开工数据的进一步支撑。

The S&P500 (.SPX) eked out another small gain on Friday, its fourth daily advance in a row and the highest close since Sept. 1. Futures were marginally higher ahead of Monday's bell - but the VIX (.VIX) volatility gauge was also slightly higher than Friday's two-month closing low.翻译:标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)周五再次小幅上涨，连续第四个交易日上涨，并创下 9 月 1 日以来的最高收盘价。周一开盘前，期货小幅走高，但 VIX (.VIX)波动率指标也出现上涨。略高于周五的两个月收盘低点。

The dollar was a big loser first thing Monday (.DXY), also hitting its lowest since Sept. 1.翻译:美元周一(.DXY)首先大幅下跌，也触及9月1日以来的最低点。

Softening U.S. debt yields have undermined the greenback but China's yuan led the way to three-month highs as the central bank there left a key interest rate unchanged and guided the renminbi higher, just as exporters rushed to convert dollar receipts.翻译:美国国债收益率疲软削弱了美元，但中国央行维持关键利率不变并引导人民币走高，而人民币则率先升至三个月高位，而出口商则急于兑换美元收益。

Japan's yen also surged as Tokyo stocks briefly hit their highest in 33 years (.N225), while speculation about a tightening of the Bank of Japan's monetary policy persisted and centred around accelerated wage growth.翻译:由于东京股市短暂触及 33 年来的最高点(.N225) ，日本日元也大幅上涨，而有关日本央行收紧货币政策的猜测持续存在，并以工资加速增长为中心。

Currency markets were also in thrall to Argentina's weekend election result, in which right-wing libertarian Javier Milei become the new president on a radical ticket of how to fix an economy battered by triple-digit inflation and rising poverty.翻译:货币市场也受到阿根廷周末选举结果的影响，右翼自由主义者哈维尔·米雷( Javier Milei)成为新总统，他提出了如何解决遭受三位数通胀和贫困加剧打击的经济的激进方案。

Milei is pledging economic shock therapy. His plans include shutting the central bank, ditching the peso and dollarizing the economy and slashing spending with potentially painful reforms.翻译:米雷承诺采取经济休克疗法。他的计划包括关闭央行、放弃比索、使经济美元化，以及通过可能痛苦的改革来削减支出。

In Europe, the debt markets started the week with relief after Moody's late on Friday confirmed Italy's investment grade sovereign credit rating and surprised markets by upping the outlook to stable.翻译:在欧洲，穆迪周五晚些时候确认了意大利的投资级主权信用评级，并将前景上调至稳定，令市场感到意外，债务市场本周伊始有所缓解。

The risk premium between German and Italian 10-year yields tightened to 170 bps - the lowest since Sept. 21.翻译:德国和意大利10年期国债收益率之间的风险溢价收紧至170个基点——为9月21日以来的最低水平。

British stocks (.FTMC) and sterling were firmer as UK finance minister Jeremy Hunt is due to present his Autumn government budget statement on Wednesday amid reports he was considering cutting income tax or national insurance and tweaking savings vehicle incentives to encourage more stock holdings.翻译:英国股市（.FTMC）和英镑走强，因为英国财政部长杰里米·亨特将于周三公布秋季政府预算声明，有报道称他正在考虑削减所得税或国民保险，并调整储蓄工具激励措施以鼓励持有更多股票。

In single stock moves, however, German chemicals giant Bayer (BAYGn.DE) lost 19% - on track for its worst day on record - after it aborted a large late-stage trial testing a new anti-clotting drug.翻译:然而，在个股走势中，德国化学巨头拜耳(BAYGn.DE)中止了一项测试新型抗凝血药物的大型后期试验，股价下跌 19%，有望创下有记录以来最糟糕的一天。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Monday:翻译:周一晚些时候应为美国市场提供更多方向的关键事态发展：

* U.S. Oct leading indicator, Canada Oct inflation翻译:* 美国10月领先指标、加拿大10月通胀

* Federal Reserve Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey, Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau and Bank of Spain Governor Pablo Hernandez de Cos all speak翻译:* 英格兰联邦储备银行行长Andrew Bailey、法国央行行长Francois Villeroy de Galhau和西班牙央行行长Pablo Hernandez de Cos均发表讲话

* U.S. Treasury auctions 20-year bonds and 3-, 6-month bills翻译:* 美国财政部拍卖20年期债券和3、6个月期票据

* U.S. corporate earnings: Zoom, Agilent Technologies, Keysight Technologies, TechPrecision, Symbotic, Remark Holdings翻译:* 美国企业财报：Zoom、Agilent Technologies、Keysight Technologies、TechPrecision、Symbotic、Remark Holdings

By Mike Dolan, editing by Ed Osmond, <a href="mailto:mike.dolan@thomsonreuters.com" target="_blank">mike.dolan@thomsonreuters.com</a>. item.title: 国际货币基金组织、中国准备与阿根廷新任领导人米莱合作
item.description:
Kristalina Georgieva, head of the International Monetary Fund, and a spokesperson for China's foreign ministry said on Monday they were ready to work with Argentina's president-elect Javier Milei.翻译:国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔利娜·格奥尔基耶娃和中国外交部发言人周一表示，他们准备与阿根廷当选总统哈维尔·米莱合作。

Argentina elected right-wing libertarian Javier Milei as its new president on Sunday, rolling the dice on an outsider with radical views to fix an economy battered by triple-digit inflation, a looming recession and rising poverty.翻译:阿根廷周日选举右翼自由主义者哈维尔·米莱为新任总统，将赌注押在了一位持激进观点的局外人身上，以修复遭受三位数通胀、迫在眉睫的衰退和贫困加剧打击的经济。

The IMF has a $44 billion loan program with Argentina.翻译:国际货币基金组织与阿根廷有 440 亿美元的贷款计划。

"We look forward to working closely with (Milei) and his administration in the period ahead to develop and implement a strong plan to safeguard macroeconomic stability and strengthen inclusive growth for all," Georgieva said in a post on X.翻译:格奥尔基耶娃在 X 上发表的一篇文章中表示：“我们期待在未来一段时间内与（米莱）及其政府密切合作，制定和实施一项强有力的计划，以维护宏观经济稳定并加强所有人的包容性增长。”

China, another key lender to Argentina, also congratulated the South American country on its election.翻译:阿根廷的另一个主要贷款国中国也祝贺这个南美国家的当选。

"We stand ready to work with the Argentine side to continue our friendship, boost our respective development and revitalization with win-win cooperation, and promote the steady and long-term development of China-Argentina relations," foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning told a regular press briefing.翻译:外交部发言人毛宁表示，我们愿同阿方一道，续写友谊，以合作共赢助力各自发展振兴，推动中阿关系行稳致远。定期举行新闻发布会。

Reporting by Karin Strohecker and Liz Lee in Beijing; editing by Marc Jones and Mark Heinrich翻译:Karin Strohecker 和 Liz Lee 北京报道；马克·琼斯和马克·海因里希编辑

item.title: 外国人和援助人员从缅甸战斗中转移到安全地带
item.description:
Hundreds of foreigners working in Myanmar, including U.N. agency staff, have been moved to safety as an insurgency against military rule gathers pace, opponents of the junta said on Monday.翻译:军政府反对者周一表示，随着反对军事统治的叛乱活动愈演愈烈，数百名在缅甸工作的外国人，包括联合国机构工作人员，已被转移到安全地带。

An alliance of ethnic minority insurgents allied with a pro-democracy parallel civilian government launched an offensive late last month in the biggest challenge to the ruling military since it seized power from elected leaders in a 2021 coup.翻译:少数族裔叛乱分子联盟与支持民主的平行文官政府于上个月末发起攻势，这是自执政军队在 2021 年政变中从民选领导人手中夺取权力以来对执政军队的最大挑战。

Hundreds of foreigners, most from neighbouring countries, have been trapped by the fighting, particularly in Shan State on the northeastern border with China and Kayah State, on the eastern border with Thailand.翻译:数百名外国人被困在战斗中，其中大部分来自邻国，特别是在东北部与中国接壤的掸邦和东部与泰国接壤的克耶邦。

China said on Monday it was helping foreigners to get out of Myanmar and it told its nationals to relocate from areas of conflict.翻译:中国周一表示，正在帮助外国人离开缅甸，并要求其国民从冲突地区搬迁。

Myanmar's civilian government-in-exile said anti-junta forces in Kayah State had paused their offensive to allow 228 aid workers, including U.N. staff, to be leave Loikaw, the state capital, after fighting there.翻译:缅甸文职流亡政府表示，克耶邦的反军政府部队已暂停攻势，允许包括联合国工作人员在内的 228 名援助人员在战斗结束后离开该邦首府垒固。

"While UN and NGO staff and family members were able to leave safely, many people remain trapped inside Loikaw," the National Unity Government, said in a statement, posted on the social media platform X, formerly known as Twitter.翻译:民族团结政府在社交媒体平台X（以前称为Twitter）上发布的一份声明中表示，“虽然联合国和非政府组织工作人员及家人能够安全离开，但许多人仍被困在垒固内。”

It said the aid workers had been taken to the town of Taunggyi in Shan State, which is under junta control.翻译:报道称，援助人员已被带到军政府控制下的掸邦东枝镇。

A junta spokesman was not immediately available for comment. U.N. agencies in Myanmar could not be immediately reached for comment.翻译:军政府发言人未能立即发表评论。记者未能立即联系到驻缅甸的联合国机构置评。

More than 250 Thais, six Filipinos and a Singaporean arrived in Thailand on the weekend after being evacuated from northern Myanmar via China, the Thai foreign ministry said.翻译:泰国外交部表示，超过 250 名泰国人、六名菲律宾人和一名新加坡人从缅甸北部经中国撤离，于周末抵达泰国。

Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning told a regular press briefing in Beijing that China was helping other countries get their people out.翻译:中国外交部发言人毛宁在北京举行的例行新闻发布会上表示，中国正在帮助其他国家撤侨。

"Recently, some countries have asked China for assistance. From a humanitarian point of view, we have provided convenience for their citizens in northern Myanmar to evacuate through China," Mao said.

'END WAR'

China, which has extensive economic interests in Myanmar, also urged "the relevant parties to put the interests of the people first, cease fire and end war as soon as possible, resolve differences through dialogue and consultation and avoid escalation", Mao said.翻译:毛泽东说，在缅甸拥有广泛经济利益的中国也敦促“有关各方以人民利益为重，尽快停火止战，通过对话协商解决分歧，避免事态升级”。

Myanmar has been in turmoil since the military ousted a government led by Nobel peace laureate Aung San Suu Kyi in the 2021 coup, ending a decade of tentative democratic reform and triggering widespread protests.翻译:自2021年军方发动政变推翻诺贝尔和平奖获得者昂山素季领导的政府以来，缅甸一直处于动荡之中，结束了十年的试探性民主改革并引发了广泛的抗议。

In various parts of the country, democracy activists have taken up arms alongside ethnic minority insurgents who have been battling for self-determination for decades.翻译:在该国各地，民主活动人士拿起武器，与几十年来一直为争取自决而斗争的少数民族叛乱分子并肩作战。

One of the group that launched the latest offensive, the Ta'ang National Liberation Army (TNLA), reported heavy clashes in Shan State on the weekend and said some of its fighters had been affected when junta forces used "gas bombs containing an internationally banned chemical weapon".翻译:发动最新攻势的组织之一德昂民族解放军（TNLA）报告称，上周末在掸邦发生了严重冲突，并表示军政府部队使用“含有国际禁止化学物质的毒气弹”，导致其部分武装人员受到影响。化学武器”。

It said its fighters had been given medical treatment but provided no evidence to back up its accusation.翻译:该组织表示，其武装人员已接受治疗，但没有提供证据支持其指控。

A junta spokesperson confirmed the fighting with the TNLA and dismissed their accusation of poisonous gas.翻译:军政府发言人证实了与 TNLA 的战斗，并驳回了他们对毒气的指控。

"They attacked and the military responded. TNLA experienced many losses and as usual, they started the regular accusations of us using toxic gas etc.," said the spokesperson, Zaw Min Tun.翻译:发言人佐敏敦 (Zaw Min Tun) 表示：“他们发起攻击，军方予以回应。TNLA 遭受了许多损失，像往常一样，他们开始定期指责我们使用有毒气体等。”

The junta has acknowledged it is facing "heavy assaults" from the insurgent groups and ordered all government staff and those with military experience in the capital to prepare to serve in case of emergency.翻译:军政府承认正面临叛乱组织的“猛烈攻击”，并命令首都所有政府工作人员和有军事经验的人员做好准备，以应对紧急情况。

Reporting by Reuters staff, additonal reporting by Liz Lee and Ethan Wang; writing by Kanupriya Kapoor; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:路透社工作人员的报道，Liz Lee 和 Ethan Wang 的补充报道；卡努普里亚·卡普尔 (Kanupriya Kapoor) 撰写；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 蒙古敦促俄罗斯和其他国家归还文物
item.description:
Mongolia on Monday called for more support from Russia, Britain and other countries to repatriate hundreds of cultural artefacts, some dating back over two millennia.翻译:蒙古周一呼吁俄罗斯、英国和其他国家提供更多支持，以归还数百件文物，其中一些文物的历史可以追溯到两千年前。

Key artefacts include a letter from Mongolia's first prime minister declaring independence from China's Manchu dynasty, currently held at the British Library in London, the Mongolian government said in a statement.翻译:蒙古政府在一份声明中表示，重要文物包括蒙古第一任总理宣布脱离中国满族王朝独立的一封信，目前保存在伦敦大英图书馆。

Artefacts associated with the Persian statesman Rashid al-Din who worked in the courts of several Mongol rulers of Persia in the 13th and 14th centuries are being kept at the Museum of Edinburgh, it also said.翻译:爱丁堡博物馆还保存着与波斯政治家拉希德·丁 (Rashid al-Din) 有关的文物，拉希德·丁曾在 13 世纪和 14 世纪在波斯的几位蒙古统治者的宫廷中工作。

In recent decades, many countries, including former colonies of European empires, have requested the return of cultural and historical artefacts taken away years ago, many of which are housed in museums reluctant to surrender their collections.翻译:近几十年来，包括欧洲帝国前殖民地在内的许多国家都要求归还多年前被拿走的文化和历史文物，其中许多文物都存放在不愿交出藏品的博物馆中。

Mongolia has made some headway in claiming back its cultural artefacts. Earlier this year, the United States returned dinosaur fossils taken out of Mongolia, including the skull of an alioramus, a smaller version of a tyrannosaurus rex that lived 70 million years ago.翻译:蒙古在收回其文物方面取得了一些进展。今年早些时候， 美国归还了从蒙古带出的恐龙化石，其中包括 alioramus 的头骨，这是生活在 7000 万年前的霸王龙的小型版本。

At a forum in Russia last week, Mongolia's Culture Minister Nomin Chinbat also requested Moscow's help with identifying and returning artefacts that were sent to Russia for research and restoration purposes one hundred years ago, including artefacts from the Hunnu dynasty 2,000 years ago excavated from the Noyon Uul burial site by Russian explorer Pyotr Kozlov in the 1920s.翻译:上周在俄罗斯举行的一个论坛上，蒙古文化部长诺敏·钦巴特还请求莫斯科帮助识别和归还一百年前送往俄罗斯用于研究和修复目的的文物，其中包括从努永河出土的2000年前匈奴王朝的文物1920 年代俄罗斯探险家彼得·科兹洛夫 (Pyotr Kozlov) 的乌尔墓地。

"I thank the countries who have supported Mongolia with this important work so far, and look forward to working with more of our international partners on these important initiatives in the spirit of friendship and mutual respect," Chinbat said.翻译:钦巴特说：“我感谢迄今为止支持蒙古开展这项重要工作的国家，并期待本着友谊和相互尊重的精神，与我们更多的国际伙伴就这些重要举措进行合作。”

Reporting by Ryan Woo; editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:瑞恩·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道；米拉尔·法赫米 编辑

item.title: 在北京，阿拉伯和穆斯林部长敦促结束加沙战争
item.description:
Arab and Muslim ministers called on Monday for an immediate ceasefire in Gaza, as their delegation visited Beijing on the first leg of a tour to push for an end to hostilities and to allow humanitarian aid into the devastated Palestinian enclave.翻译:阿拉伯和穆斯林部长周一呼吁加沙立即停火，他们的代表团在其访问的第一站访问北京，以推动结束敌对行动并允许人道主义援助进入遭受破坏的巴勒斯坦飞地。

The delegation, which is set to meet officials representing each of the five permanent members of the U.N. Security Council, is also piling pressure on the West to reject Israel's justification of its actions against Palestinians as self-defence.翻译:该代表团将与代表联合国安理会五个常任理事国的官员会面，并向西方施加压力，要求其拒绝接受以色列将其针对巴勒斯坦人的行动视为自卫的理由。

The officials holding meetings with China's top diplomat Wang Yi on Monday are from Saudi Arabia, Jordan, Egypt, Indonesia, Palestinian authorities and the Organisation of Islamic Cooperation, among others.翻译:周一与中国最高外交官王毅举行会晤的官员来自沙特阿拉伯、约旦、埃及、印度尼西亚、巴勒斯坦当局和伊斯兰合作组织等。

"We are here to send a clear signal: that is we must immediately stop the fighting and the killings, we must immediately deliver humanitarian supplies to Gaza," said Saudi Foreign Minister Prince Faisal bin Farhan Al Saud.翻译:沙特外交大臣费萨尔·本·法尔汉·阿勒沙特亲王表示：“我们来这里是为了发出一个明确的信号：那就是我们必须立即停止战斗和杀戮，我们必须立即向加沙运送人道主义物资。”

The extraordinary joint Islamic-Arab summit in Riyadh this month also urged the International Criminal Court to investigate "war crimes and crimes against humanity that Israel is committing" in the Palestinian territories.翻译:本月在利雅得举行的特别伊斯兰-阿拉伯联合峰会还敦促国际刑事法院调查以色列在巴勒斯坦领土上犯下的“战争罪和反人类罪”。

Saudi Arabia has sought to press the United States and Israel for an end to hostilities in Gaza, and Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, the kingdom's de facto ruler, gathered Arab and Muslim leaders to reinforce that message.翻译:沙特阿拉伯一直试图向美国和以色列施压，要求其结束加沙的敌对行动，而该国事实上的统治者王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼则召集了阿拉伯和穆斯林领导人来强化这一信息。

In comments posted by his ministry on X, formerly known as Twitter, Egyptian foreign minister Sameh Shoukry told his Chinese counterpart: "We look forward to a stronger role on the part of great powers such as China in order to stop the attacks against the Palestinians in the Gaza Strip. Unfortunately, there are major countries that give cover to the current Israeli attacks."翻译:埃及外交部长萨梅赫·舒克里(Sameh Shoukry)在X（前身为推特）上发表评论时告诉中国外长：“我们期待中国等大国发挥更强有力的作用，以制止针对巴勒斯坦人的袭击“在加沙地带。不幸的是，有一些主要国家为以色列当前的袭击提供掩护。”

About 240 hostages were taken during Hamas's deadly cross-border rampage into Israel on Oct. 7, which prompted Israel to invade the Gaza Strip with the intention of eradicating the Islamist militant group.翻译:10 月 7 日，哈马斯跨境对以色列发动致命袭击，造成约 240 名人质被劫持，这促使以色列入侵加沙地带，意图消灭这个伊斯兰激进组织。

Gaza's Hamas-run government said at least 13,000 Palestinians have been killed in Israeli bombardments since then, including at least 5,500 children.翻译:加沙哈马斯政府表示，自那时以来，至少有 13,000 名巴勒斯坦人在以色列的轰炸中丧生，其中包括至少 5,500 名儿童。

Israeli ambassador to Beijing Irit Ben-Abba told foreign reporters at a briefing on Monday that she hoped there would not be "any statements from this visit about a ceasefire, now is not the time."翻译:以色列驻北京大使伊里特·本-阿巴在周一的新闻发布会上对外国记者表示，她希望“这次访问不会发表任何有关停火的声明，现在不是时候”。

She said that Israel hoped that the delegation would talk about hostages captured by Hamas "and call for their immediate release without preconditions," adding that the parties involved should talk together about Egypt's "role in facilitating humanitarian assistance."

'BROTHER AND FRIEND'

China's Wang said Beijing was a "good friend and brother of Arab and Muslim countries," adding it has "always firmly supported the just cause of the Palestinian people to restore their legitimate national rights and interests."翻译:中国王毅表示，北京是“阿拉伯和穆斯林国家的好朋友、好兄弟”，并补充说，中国“始终坚定支持巴勒斯坦人民恢复合法民族权益的正义事业”。

Since the start of hostilities, China's foreign ministry has repeatedly stopped short of condemning Hamas, instead calling for de-escalation and for Israel and Palestine to pursue a "two-state solution" for an independent Palestine.翻译:自敌对行动开始以来，中国外交部一再没有谴责哈马斯，而是呼吁缓和局势，并呼吁以色列和巴勒斯坦寻求“两国解决方案”以实现独立的巴勒斯坦。

Since the end of China's nearly three years of COVID lockdowns, Xi has launched a diplomatic push aimed at countering the United States and its allies, who he says seek to contain and suppress his country.翻译:自中国近三年的新冠封锁结束以来，习近平发起了旨在对抗美国及其盟国的外交努力，他说美国及其盟国试图遏制和镇压中国。

Beijing has deepened alliances with non-Western led multilateral groups such as the BRICS bloc of nations while strengthening ties with countries in the Middle East and the Global South.翻译:北京深化了与金砖国家集团等非西方主导的多边组织的联盟，同时加强了与中东和南方国家的关系。

On Monday, Wang added China will work to "quell the fighting in Gaza as soon as possible, alleviate the humanitarian crisis and promote an early, comprehensive, just and lasting settlement of the Palestinian issue."翻译:王毅周一表示，中国将致力于“尽快平息加沙战斗，缓解人道主义危机，推动巴勒斯坦问题早日全面、公正、持久解决”。

China's special envoy on the Middle East, Zhai Jun, has engaged officials from Israel and the Palestinian Authority - which governs in the occupied West Bank - as well as the Arab League and EU in the last year to discuss a two-state solution and recognition for Palestine at the United Nations.翻译:去年，中国中东问题特使翟隽与以色列和巴勒斯坦权力机构（在被占领的约旦河西岸治理）以及阿拉伯联盟和欧盟的官员进行了接触，讨论两国解决方案和承认问题在联合国代表巴勒斯坦。

(This story has been corrected to refer to the Palestinian representation in paragraph 3)翻译:（这个故事已被更正，以提及第 3 段中的巴勒斯坦代表）

item.title: 阿迪达斯、沃尔玛和其他品牌的废物为柬埔寨砖窑提供燃料——报告
item.description:
Waste from at least 19 international brands including Adidas and Walmart is being used to fuel kilns in brick factories in Cambodia, and some workers were falling ill, according to a report by a local rights group released on Monday.翻译:据当地人权组织周一发布的一份报告称，包括阿迪达斯和沃尔玛在内的至少 19 个国际品牌的废物被用来为柬埔寨砖厂的窑炉提供燃料，一些工人生病了。

The report by The Cambodian League for the Promotion and Defense of Human Rights, commonly known by its French acronym LICADHO, was based on visits to 21 brick factories in the Cambodian capital Phnom Penh and neighbouring Kandal province between April and September, as well as interviews with current and former workers.翻译:柬埔寨促进和捍卫人权联盟（其法语缩写为 LICADHO）的这份报告基于 4 月至 9 月期间对柬埔寨首都金边和邻近干丹省 21 家砖厂的走访以及采访与现任和前任工人。

It found pre-consumer garment waste including fabric, plastic, rubber, and other materials from the brands was being burned at seven factories. The factories were burning garment waste to save on fuel costs, it said.翻译:研究发现，七家工厂正在焚烧消费前服装废料，包括织物、塑料、橡胶和其他品牌材料。据称，工厂正在焚烧服装废料以节省燃料成本。

"Several workers reported that burning garment waste caused them headaches and respiratory problems; another worker reported that it made her feel especially unwell during her pregnancies," the report said.翻译:报告称：“几名工人报告说，燃烧服装废料导致他们头痛和呼吸系统问题；另一名工人报告说，这让她在怀孕期间感觉特别不舒服。”

Several brands, including Primark and Lidl, said they were investigating the matter.翻译:Primark 和 Lidl 等多个品牌表示正在调查此事。

Burning garment waste can release substances toxic to humans if combustion conditions aren't carefully managed, and the ashes can also contain high levels of pollutants, according to an internal 2020 study by the U.N. Development Programme which measured emissions from garment factory incinerators in Cambodia that burn garment waste, and which was seen by Reuters.翻译:根据联合国开发计划署 2020 年的一项内部研究，该研究测量了柬埔寨服装厂焚烧炉的排放量，如果燃烧条件管理不当，燃烧的服装废料可能会释放出对人体有毒的物质，而且灰烬中还可能含有高浓度的污染物。焚烧服装废料，路透社看到了这一点。

The report said these toxic substances include dioxins, which can cause cancer. The UNDP did not respond to a request for comment on the report.翻译:报告称，这些有毒物质包括二恶英，可致癌。开发计划署没有回应对该报告发表评论的请求。

A separate report from 2018 by UK academics at Royal Holloway, University of London, said clothing scraps often contain toxic chemicals including chlorine bleach, formaldehyde, and ammonia, as well as heavy metals, PVC, and resins used in the dyeing and printing processes.翻译:伦敦大学皇家霍洛威学院的英国学者在 2018 年发布的另一份报告称，衣物废料通常含有有毒化学物质，包括氯漂白剂、甲醛和氨，以及重金属、PVC 和染色和印刷过程中使用的树脂。

Brick factory workers reported regular migraines, nosebleeds, and other illnesses, the UK report said.翻译:英国报告称，砖厂工人经常报告偏头痛、流鼻血和其他疾病。

The brands named in the LICADHO report are: Adidas, C&A, LPP's Cropp and Sinsay, Disney, Gap, Old Navy, Athleta, Karbon, Kiabi, Lululemon Athletica, Lidl Stiftung & Co's Lupilu, Walmart's No Boundaries, Primark, Reebok, Sweaty Betty, Tilley Endurables, Under Armour, and Venus Fashion.翻译:LICADHO 报告中列出的品牌包括：阿迪达斯、C&A、LPP 的 Cropp 和 Sinsay、迪士尼、Gap、Old Navy、Athleta、Karbon、Kiabi、Lululemon Athletica、Lidl Stiftung & Co 的 Lupilu、沃尔玛的 No Boundaries、Primark、Reebok、Sweaty Betty 、Tilley Endurables、Under Armour 和 Venus Fashion。

Adidas, which sources from 16 factories in Cambodia, said it has initiated an investigation to see if waste is being diverted from the authorised disposal routes to the brick kilns.翻译:阿迪达斯从柬埔寨 16 家工厂采购原料，该公司表示已启动调查，看看废物是否从授权处置路线转移到砖窑。

Adidas environmental policies in Cambodia state that all waste materials from apparel suppliers must be disposed of, either to an approved waste-to-energy plant that is fully regulated and has air quality controls, or to government-licensed recycling centres, the company said.翻译:该公司表示，柬埔寨的阿迪达斯环境政策规定，来自服装供应商的所有废料都必须进行处置，要么到经过全面监管且具有空气质量控制的批准的废物能源工厂，要么到政府许可的回收中心。

Lidl said it takes the conditions reported by LICADHO very seriously and that it has started investigations, but could not provide any further information.翻译:Lidl表示，它非常重视LICADHO报告的情况，并已开始调查，但无法提供任何进一步的信息。

LPP said it was unaware its textile waste was being burned in brick kilns, and has contacted its agents responsible for placing orders in Cambodia. LPP said it plans an awareness day in early 2024 for its agents and factories in Cambodia with a particular focus on waste management.翻译:LPP 表示，不知道其纺织废料正在砖窑中焚烧，并已联系其负责在柬埔寨下订单的代理商。 LPP 表示，计划于 2024 年初为其在柬埔寨的代理商和工厂举办一个宣传日，重点关注废物管理。

Primark, which sources from 20 factories in Cambodia, said it is investigating the issue. Sweaty Betty did not comment on the specific findings, but said it works closely with suppliers to ensure full compliance with its environmental code of conduct.翻译:Primark 从柬埔寨 20 家工厂采购，表示正在调查这一问题。 Sweaty Betty 没有对具体调查结果发表评论，但表示它与供应商密切合作，以确保完全遵守其环境行为准则。

C&A said it complies with local laws and regulations and monitors its suppliers through third-party assessments and follow-up visits by its own local staff. It said it immediately investigates any irregularities.翻译:C&A表示，其遵守当地法律法规，并通过第三方评估和当地员工的跟踪访问来监控其供应商。该公司表示将立即调查任何违规行为。

Tilley Endurables said it was "very concerned" with the findings and only works with factories that have passed audits.翻译:Tilley Endurables 表示，它对调查结果“非常关注”，并且只与通过审核的工厂合作。

Tilley said the factory that produced its items was audited by World Responsible Accredited Production (WRAP), and had committed to ensuring proper waste management based on local laws and internationally recognised standards. Tilley said it further investigated and found the factory uses a Cambodian Ministry of Environment-licensed waste removal company and does not have visibility into what happens to the waste once it is collected.翻译:蒂利表示，生产其产品的工厂经过了世界责任认证生产（WRAP）的审核，并致力于确保根据当地法律和国际公认的标准进行适当的废物管理。蒂利表示，经过进一步调查，发现该工厂使用了柬埔寨环境部许可的废物清除公司，无法了解废物收集后的处理情况。

The other brands did not immediately reply to Reuters' requests for comment. The WRAP, the Cambodian Ministry of Environment, and waste collection company Sarom Trading Co. Ltd, did not respond to requests for comment.翻译:其他品牌没有立即回复路透社的置评请求。 WRAP、柬埔寨环境部和废物收集公司 Sarom Trading Co. Ltd 没有回应置评请求。

Reporting by Clare Baldwin and Helen Reid. Additional reporting by Katherine Masters. Editing by Miral Fahmy.翻译:克莱尔·鲍德温和海伦·里德报道。凯瑟琳·马斯特斯的补充报道。米拉尔·法赫米编辑。

item.title: 台湾前美国特使在美国知名，遭中国诽谤，被任命为副总统候选人
item.description:
Lai Ching-te, the frontrunner for Taiwan's presidency, named on Monday Taipei's former envoy to the United States as his running mate in January's election, a high-profile diplomat well known in Washington but who Beijing denounces as a separatist.翻译:台湾总统大选的领跑者赖清德周一任命台北前驻美特使为自己一月份选举的竞选伙伴。赖清德是一位在华盛顿广为人知的高调外交官，但北京方面将其谴责为分裂分子。

Lai, vice president and the ruling Democratic Progressive Party's (DPP) presidential candidate, has led in most opinion polls ahead of the election, which is taking place as Taiwan comes under increased pressure from China to accept its sovereignty claim.翻译:副总统、执政的民进党（DPP）总统候选人赖智在选举前的大多数民意调查中都处于领先地位，此次选举正值台湾面临来自中国越来越大的压力，要求其接受其主权主张。

His running mate, Hsiao Bi-khim, 52, who had been Taiwan's de facto ambassador to the United States since 2020, has extensive connections in Washington, and had been widely expected to be Lai's partner on his ticket.翻译:他的竞选搭档、52 岁的萧美琴自 2020 年以来一直担任台湾事实上的驻美国大使，在华盛顿拥有广泛的人脉，人们普遍预计他将成为黎智英的竞选搭档。

Hsiao said she had shared values with Lai including defending Taiwan's freedom and democracy.翻译:萧表示，她与黎智英有共同的价值观，包括捍卫台湾的自由和民主。

"I believe we have lots of common convictions - we are both willing to take on responsibility for Taiwan," she told reporters as she stood next to Lai at campaign headquarters in Taipei.翻译:“我相信我们有很多共同的信念——我们都愿意为台湾承担责任，”她在台北竞选总部站在黎智英旁边对记者说。

The foreign ministry accepted her resignation as U.S. envoy earlier in the day.翻译:外交部当天早些时候接受了她辞去美国特使职务的请求。

Rupert Hammond-Chambers, president of the U.S.-Taiwan Business Council who has known Hsiao since the 1990s, said she was a "formidable politician", and would add much needed diplomatic and security heft to Lai's ticket.翻译:自 20 世纪 90 年代以来，美台商业全国委员会主席鲁珀特·哈蒙德-钱伯斯 (Rupert Hammond-Chambers) 就认识萧萧，他表示她是一位“令人敬畏的政治家”，将为黎智英的选票增添急需的外交和安全影响力。

"Bi-khim's relationships in D.C. will be invaluable to a President Lai, if he is elected, she's going to bring all of those relationships into his government and he doesn't have those," he told Reuters.翻译:他告诉路透社：“碧金在华盛顿特区的关系对于赖总统来说是无价的，如果他当选，她将把所有这些关系带入他的政府，而他没有这些。”

The United States, as with most countries, has no formal ties with Taiwan, but is the island's most important international supporter and arms supplier.翻译:与大多数国家一样，美国与台湾没有正式关系，但却是台湾最重要的国际支持者和武器供应商。

Like Lai, Hsiao is despised by China, which has twice placed sanctions on her, most recently in April, saying she was an "independence diehard".翻译:和黎智英一样，萧也受到中国的蔑视，中国已两次对她实施制裁，最近一次是在四月，称她是“独立顽固分子”。

China's foreign ministry declined to answer a question about Hsiao, saying it was not a diplomatic issue.

'INDEPENDENCE ACT'

China's Taiwan Affairs Office on Wednesday referred to Lai and Hsiao as an "independence double act", adding that Taiwan's people were "very clear" about what their partnership meant for the "situation in the Taiwan Strait". It did not elaborate.翻译:中国台湾事务办公室周三称赖和萧是“独立双重行为”，并补充说，台湾人民“非常清楚”他们的伙伴关系对“台海局势”意味着什么。它没有详细说明。

Lai, asked about these comments, dismissed what he said were "thoughtless remarks".翻译:当被问及这些言论时，黎智英驳斥了他所说的“轻率言论”。

"This is sufficient to prove that China is intervening in this election," he told reporters. "We only put importance on our people's issues."翻译:“这足以证明中国正在干预这次选举，”他对记者说。 “我们只重视人民的问题。”

China carried out military drills around Taiwan in August, after Lai returned from a brief visit to the United States, in what the Chinese military said was a "serious warning against Taiwan independence separatist forces colluding with external forces to provoke".翻译:今年8月，黎智英短暂访问美国回国后，中国在台湾周边进行了军事演习，中国军方称这是“对台独分裂势力勾结外部势力挑衅的严重警告”。

The DPP champions Taiwan's separate identity from China. The DPP-led government says only Taiwan's people can decide their future, and it has repeatedly offered talks with Beijing but been rebuffed.翻译:民进党主张台湾与中国的独立身份。民进党领导的政府表示，只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来，并多次提出与北京进行会谈，但遭到拒绝。

The DPP's smooth handling of its vice presidential nominee stands in contrast with efforts by Taiwan's two main opposition parties to agree on a joint ticket. Their negotiations have stalled.翻译:民进党对其副总统候选人的顺利处理与台湾两个主要反对党就联合候选人的努力形成鲜明对比。他们的谈判陷入僵局。

The largest opposition party, the Kuomintang (KMT), which traditionally favours close ties with Beijing, is locked in a dispute with the smaller Taiwan People's Party about which of their candidates should run as president and which as vice president after initially agreeing to work together.翻译:传统上倾向于与北京保持密切关系的最大反对党国民党，在最初同意合作后，与规模较小的台湾人民党就谁应竞选总统、谁应竞选副总统陷入争议。

The deadline to register presidential candidates with the election commission is Friday.翻译:向选举委员会登记总统候选人的截止日期是周五。

Lai, writing on Facebook earlier on Monday, pointed to the "turmoil" in the opposition camp.翻译:赖智周一早些时候在脸书上写道，指出反对派阵营的“混乱”。

"In contrast, the team I lead is definitely a fully prepared and tested one," he said.翻译:“相比之下，我领导的团队绝对是一支准备充分、经过考验的团队，”他说。

Hsiao was born in Japan to a Taiwanese father and American mother and initially worked in the office of then-president Chen Shui-bian, also from the DPP, and then as a DPP lawmaker.翻译:萧出生于日本，父亲是台湾人，母亲是美国人，最初在同样出身民进党的时任总统陈水扁的办公室工作，后来成为民进党议员。

Unusually in Taiwan, she uses an English spelling of her name based on its Taiwanese Hokkien pronunciation to underscore her identity as being Taiwanese and not Chinese.翻译:在台湾不同寻常的是，她使用基于台湾闽南语发音的英文拼写她的名字，以强调她是台湾人而不是中国人的身份。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard and Fabian Hamacher; Additional reporting by Yimou Lee; Editing by Miral Fahmy, Robert Birsel翻译:本·布兰查德 (Ben Blanchard) 和法比安·哈马赫 (Fabian Hamacher) 报道；李艺谋补充报道；编辑：米拉尔·法赫米、罗伯特·伯塞尔

item.title: 中国表示为缅甸北部过境提供便利
item.description:
China has facilitated transit through the country from northern Myanmar amid the conflict there as some parties have been asking for assistance, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Monday.翻译:中国外交部周一表示，在缅甸北部冲突期间，由于一些各方一直在寻求援助，中国已为从缅甸北部过境提供便利。

China will stay in contact with related countries on what is to be done next, ministry spokesperson Mao Ning told a regular press briefing.翻译:外交部发言人毛宁在例行记者会上表示，中方将与有关国家就下一步行动保持沟通。

More than two hundred Thai nationals trapped by the surge in fighting in northern Myanmar between junta soldiers and armed ethnic-minority groups are being evacuated to Thailand via China, the Thai foreign ministry said on Sunday.翻译:泰国外交部周日表示，因缅甸北部军政府士兵与少数民族武装团体之间的战斗激增而被困的 200 多名泰国国民正通过中国撤离至泰国。

item.title: 行业前景严峻，富士康电动汽车部门上市首日下跌
item.description:
Shares in Foxtron Vehicle Technologies (2258.TW), a unit of Taiwanese contract manufacturer Foxconn (2317.TW), fell in their market debut on Monday, hurt by concerns over headwinds in the highly competitive electric vehicle market.翻译:台湾合约制造商富士康（2317.TW）旗下子公司富士创汽车科技（2258.TW）的股价周一在首次上市时下跌，原因是对竞争激烈的电动汽车市场的不利因素的担忧。

Foxtron shares did recover some ground from earlier losses of as much as 9%, ending down 2.7% which gave it a market capitalisation of around $2.7 billion.翻译:Foxtron 股价确实从早前高达 9% 的跌幅中恢复了一些，最终下跌 2.7%，市值约为 27 亿美元。

In addition to inflation and higher interest rates which have raised the cost of buying a car, EV makers are grappling with supply-chain bottlenecks and pricing pressure.翻译:除了通货膨胀和利率上升导致购车成本上升之外，电动汽车制造商还面临着供应链瓶颈和定价压力。

"The EV market has been flooded by a red sea of price cuts by major players such as Tesla," said an analyst at Mega International Securities, who asked not to be named, citing the firm's policies on commenting publicly on listed companies.翻译:兆丰国际证券一位不愿透露姓名的分析师援引该公司公开评论上市公司的政策表示，“电动汽车市场已经被特斯拉等主要厂商的降价红海所淹没。”

"Foxtron has lost money in 2021 and 2022, and we don't think it will turn that around in the next two years."翻译:“Foxtron 在 2021 年和 2022 年都出现了亏损，我们认为未来两年内不会扭转局面。”

Foxtron is a joint venture between Foxconn - the world's largest contract manufacturer for iPhones and other consumer electronics - and local car maker Yulon (2201.TW). It currently has only one client, Luxgen, which is owned by Yulon.翻译:Foxtron 是全球最大的 iPhone 和其他消费电子产品合同制造商富士康与本地汽车制造商裕隆汽车(2201.TW)之间的合资企业。目前它只有一个客户，即裕隆集团旗下的纳智捷 (Luxgen)。

Young Liu, chairman of both Foxtron and Foxconn, said, however, the company has a clear strategy for growth.翻译:不过，富士创和富士康董事长刘扬表示，该公司有明确的增长战略。

"Foxtron will build its foundation in Taiwan, leveraging our own design and service momentum in EV, as well as Foxconn's proven business models to guide our entry into the North America, Southeast Asia mainstream markets."翻译:“富士创将在台湾打下基础，利用我们自己在电动汽车领域的设计和服务势头，以及富士康成熟的商业模式，引导我们进入北美、东南亚主流市场。”

The company raised T$7.5 billion ($235 million) in its initial public offering.翻译:该公司在首次公开募股中筹集了 75 亿新台币（2.35 亿美元）。

Separately, Liu declined to comment on what contingency plans Foxconn has should founder Terry Gou finalise his run for Taiwan's president by registering with the election commission, which he has until Friday to do so.翻译:另外，刘拒绝评论富士康如果创始人郭台铭通过向选举委员会登记最终竞选台湾总统，富士康有哪些应急计划，他必须在周五之前完成登记。

China last month announced a tax probe into Foxconn - a move which the Chinese newspaper that revealed the investigation attributed to Beijing's unhappiness with Gou's decision to run for president.翻译:中国上个月宣布对富士康展开税务调查，报道此次调查的中国报纸将此举归因于北京方面对郭台铭竞选国家主席的决定感到不满。

($1 = 31.7350 Taiwan dollars)翻译:(1 美元 = 31.7350 新台币)

Reporting by Ben Blanchard and Faith Hung in Taipei; Editing by Anne Marie Roantree, Shri Navaratnam and Edwina Gibbs翻译:Ben Blanchard 和 Faith Hung 在台北的报道；编辑：Anne Marie Roantree、Shri Navaratnam 和 Edwina Gibbs

item.title: 早盘买盘：日本股市像 1990 年一样狂欢
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Monday.翻译:从周一开始展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天。

It's been a mixed start for most of Asia in this holiday-truncated week, though Japanese shares extended their bull streak to hit highs not seen since 1990.翻译:尽管日本股市延续牛市势头，创下 1990 年以来的新高，但在这个因假期而缩短的一周中，亚洲大部分地区的开局喜忧参半。

The Nikkei is up more than 8% so far this month, and almost 29% for the year so far. The broader Topix is up 26% on the year but still only trades at a price to earnings ratio of 14. That compares to 23 for the S&P 500 and almost 29 for the Nasdaq.翻译:本月迄今为止，日经指数已上涨超过 8%，今年迄今已上涨近 29%。更广泛的东证指数今年上涨了 26%，但市盈率仍仅为 14。相比之下，标准普尔 500 指数为 23，纳斯达克指数为近 29。

The entire market capitalisation of the Topix is 454 trillion yen ($3.03 trillion), yet Japanese companies held 555 trillion yen in internal reserves at the end of the financial year. Half of the listed Japanese companies trade at below book value, and in aggregate hold 20% more cash than their market cap.翻译:东证指数的总市值为 454 万亿日元（3.03 万亿美元），但日本企业在本财年末持有的内部储备为 555 万亿日元。半数日本上市公司的交易价格低于账面价值，且持有的现金总额比其市值高出 20%。

Corporate profits ex-financials reached a record high of 32 trillion yen in the April-June quarter and recent earnings results have shown the benefit of a weak yen and the return of some pricing power after decades of deflation.翻译:4 月至 6 月季度的企业除财务利润达到创纪录的 32 万亿日元，最近的盈利结果显示了日元疲软的好处以及几十年通货紧缩后部分定价能力的回归。

Recent surveys show inflation expectations are finally picking up which may prompt households to invest some of the 1,000 trillion yen they currently keep in cash and deposits into equities and bonds.翻译:最近的调查显示，通胀预期最终回升，这可能会促使家庭将目前持有的 1000 万亿日元现金和存款中的一部分投资于股票和债券。

Japan consumer price data for October are due Friday and are forecast to show core rates moved back up to 3.0%, some way above the Bank of Japan's 2% target.翻译:日本 10 月份消费者价格数据将于周五公布，预计核心利率将回升至 3.0%，略高于日本央行 2% 的目标。

A strong wage round and early signs of more bumper pay awards for next year are stoking speculation the BOJ will finally unwind its uber-easy policy, and maybe even turn rates positive - a major boon for financial sector stocks.翻译:一轮强劲的工资上涨以及明年更多丰厚薪资奖励的早期迹象引发了人们的猜测，日本央行将最终放松其超级宽松政策，甚至可能将利率转为正数，这对金融板块股票来说是一个重大利好。

China's central bank kept its main rates steady on Monday as widely expected, but did set another firm fix for the yuan that saw the dollar slip under 7.2000 and fall more broadly.翻译:正如普遍预期，中国央行周一维持主要利率稳定，但确实对人民币再次确定了固定汇率，导致美元跌破7.2000并出现更广泛的下跌。

There were media reports Israel, the United States and Hamas had reached a tentative agreement to free dozens of hostages in Gaza in exchange for a five-day pause in fighting, but no confirmation as yet.翻译:有媒体报道称，以色列、美国和哈马斯已达成临时协议，释放加沙数十名人质，以换取暂停战斗五天，但尚未得到证实。

S&P 500 and Nasdaq futures were trading a fraction softer on Monday, but are still up sharply on the year so far driven by huge gains in the seven mega-cap darlings.翻译:周一，标普 500 指数和纳斯达克期货交易略有走软，但在七只巨型股宠儿大幅上涨的推动下，今年迄今仍大幅上涨。

Tech major Nvidia (NVDA.O) reports quarterly results on Tuesday, and all eyes will be on the state of demand for its AI related products.翻译:科技巨头英伟达(NVDA.O)周二公布季度业绩，所有人的目光都将集中在其人工智能相关产品的需求状况上。

The Black Friday sales will test the pulse of the consumer-driven U.S. economy this week, while the Thanksgiving holiday will make for thin trading.翻译:本周黑色星期五的销售将考验消费者驱动的美国经济的脉搏，而感恩节假期将导致交易清淡。

The flow of U.S. economic data turns to a trickle this week, but minutes of the Federal Reserve's last meeting will offer some colour on policy makers' thinking as they held rates steady for a second time.翻译:本周美国经济数据流转为涓涓细流，但美联储上次会议纪要将为政策制定者第二次维持利率稳定之际的想法提供一些色彩。

Markets are clearly vulnerable to any hawkish hints given they have priced in early and aggressive easing for 2024.翻译:鉴于市场已经消化了 2024 年早期和激进的宽松政策，市场显然很容易受到任何鹰派暗示的影响。

Futures imply zero chance of a further hike in December or next year, and imply a 30% chance of an easing starting in March. Futures also imply around 100 basis points of cuts for 2024, up from 77 basis points before the benign October inflation report roiled markets.翻译:期货意味着 12 月或明年进一步加息的可能性为零，而意味着 3 月份开始宽松的可能性为 30%。期货还暗示 2024 年将降息约 100 个基点，高于 10 月份温和通胀报告扰乱市场之前的 77 个基点。

Key developments that could influence markets on Monday:翻译:可能影响周一市场的主要事态发展：

item.title: 菲律宾马科斯称缅甸是东盟的一个难题
item.description:
The conflict in military-ruled Myanmar has been a difficult issue for the Southeast Asian bloc ASEAN to address, with little progress made towards a resolution and intensifying fighting, Philippines President Ferdinand Marcos said.翻译:菲律宾总统费迪南德·马科斯表示，军政府统治下的缅甸冲突一直是东南亚集团东盟难以解决的一个难题，在解决问题方面进展甚微，战斗也在加剧。

Speaking at a forum in Hawaii streamed live in the Philippines on Monday, Marcos said there was commitment from the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), but the issue was complex, including the humanitarian impact.翻译:马科斯周一在菲律宾直播的夏威夷论坛上发表讲话时表示，东南亚国家联盟（东盟）做出了承诺，但问题很复杂，包括人道主义影响。

The United Nations says more than a million people have been displaced since Myanmar's military staged a coup in 2021, upending a decade of tentative democracy and plunging the country into conflict and economic ruin.翻译:联合国表示，自 2021 年缅甸军方发动政变以来，已有超过一百万人流离失所，颠覆了十年来的试探性民主，使该国陷入冲突和经济崩溃。

"There is a great deal of impetus for ASEAN to solve this problem. But it is a very, very difficult problem," Marcos said.翻译:马科斯说：“东盟有很大动力解决这个问题。但这是一个非常非常困难的问题。”

The junta's post-coup crackdown on opponents gave rise to a resistance movement that has been growing in strength. ASEAN has barred the top generals from attending its meeting until they commit to the bloc's two-year-old peace roadmap.翻译:军政府在政变后对反对派的镇压引发了一场不断壮大的抵抗运动。东盟禁止高级将领参加会议，除非他们承诺遵守该集团两年来的和平路线图。

The Philippines will chair ASEAN in 2026 after it replaced Myanmar as host that year.翻译:菲律宾取代缅甸成为2026年东盟主席国。

Tens of thousands more people have been displaced since last month as the military battles a coordinated offensive by an alliance of three ethnic-minority groups and pro-democracy fighters.翻译:自上个月以来，随着军队与三个少数民族团体和民主战士联盟的协调进攻，又有数万人流离失所。

Marcos, citing analyses of the recent escalation, said the junta had already lost support from its own military.翻译:马科斯援引对最近升级事件的分析称，军政府已经失去了自己军队的支持。

He said the humanitarian cost of conflict had "grown exponentially" in recent years, with the Philippines also impacted with its citizens among victims of human trafficking there.翻译:他表示，近年来，冲突造成的人道主义损失“呈指数级增长”，菲律宾人口贩运受害者中的公民也受到影响。

item.title: 中国维持贷款基准利率不变，符合预期
item.description:
China left benchmark lending rates unchanged at a monthly fixing on Monday, matching expectations, as a weaker yuan continued to limit further monetary easing and policymakers waited to see the effects of previous stimulus on credit demand.翻译:中国周一将基准贷款利率维持在月度固定利率不变，符合预期，因为人民币贬值继续限制进一步的货币宽松，政策制定者正在等待之前的刺激措施对信贷需求的影响。

Recent data shows the recovery in the world's second-largest economy remains patchy with industrial output and retail sales surprising on the upside but deflation gathering pace and few signs the struggling property market will bounce back any time soon.翻译:最近的数据显示，世界第二大经济体的复苏仍然参差不齐， 工业产出和零售销售意外上行，但通货紧缩步伐加快，几乎没有迹象表明陷入困境的房地产市场会很快反弹。

While the economy still needs more policy stimulus, an escalation of monetary easing would add unwanted downside pressure on the Chinese currency.翻译:尽管经济仍需要更多政策刺激，但货币宽松升级将给人民币带来不必要的下行压力。

The one-year loan prime rate (LPR) was kept at 3.45% and the five-year LPR was unchanged at 4.20%.翻译:一年期贷款市场报价利率（LPR）维持在3.45%，五年期贷款市场报价利率（LPR）维持在4.20%不变。

Most new and outstanding loans in China are based on the one-year LPR, while the five-year rate influences the pricing of mortgages.翻译:中国的大部分新增贷款和未偿还贷款均基于一年期LPR，而五年期利率则影响抵押贷款的定价。

In a poll of 26 market watchers conducted last week, all participants predicted no change to either the one-year or five-year LPR.翻译:上周对 26 名市场观察人士进行的一项民意调查显示，所有参与者均预测一年期或五年期 LPR 不会发生变化。

The steady fixings came after the central bank kept its medium-term interbank liquidity rate unchanged last week. The one-year LPR is loosely pegged off the medium-term lending facility (MLF) and market participants typically see changes in the MLF rate as a precursor to adjustments in the LPR.翻译:在央行上周维持中期银行间流动性利率不变后，利率稳定。一年期LPR与中期借贷便利（MLF）松散挂钩，市场参与者通常将MLF利率的变化视为LPR调整的先兆。

The PBOC injected 1.45 trillion yuan worth of one-year MLF loans into the banking system last week but kept the rates on those loans unchanged.翻译:中国人民银行上周向银行体系注入了1.45万亿元一年期MLF贷款，但维持这些贷款利率不变。

The liquidity boost resulted in a net 600 billion yuan of cash injections into the banking system, the biggest monthly increase since December 2016.翻译:流动性增加导致银行体系现金净注入6000亿元，创2016年12月以来最大单月增幅。

"Policymakers may want more time to access the impact of the recent repricing of existing mortgage contracts before they make further changes to the benchmark rate," Julian Evans-Pritchard, head of China economics at Capital Economics, said in a note released before the LPR fixing.翻译:凯投宏观(Capital Economics)中国经济主管朱利安·埃文斯-普里查德(Julian Evans-Pritchard)在LPR之前发布的一份报告中表示，“政策制定者可能需要更多时间来了解近期现有抵押贷款合同重新定价的影响，然后再进一步调整基准利率。”定影。

"The big picture though is that, with economic momentum weak and downward pressure on the renminbi reversing, we think rate reductions will come before long," he said, expecting China to lower the lending benchmark by 20 basis points at the end of the first quarter next year.翻译:他表示，“但大局是，随着经济动力疲软，人民币下行压力逆转，我们认为降息很快就会到来”，并预计中国将在第一季度末将贷款基准下调20个基点。明年季度。

China's yuan has clawed back some of its year-to-date losses after losing more than 6% against the dollar at one point in September.翻译:人民币兑美元汇率在 9 月份一度下跌超过 6% 后，现已收复部分年初至今的跌幅。

China remains an outlier among global central banks, having loosened monetary policy to shore up a faltering recovery but further rate cuts would widen the yield gap with the United States, risking yuan depreciation and capital outflows.翻译:中国在全球央行中仍然是一个异类，它已经放松了货币政策以支撑步履蹒跚的复苏，但进一步降息将扩大与美国的收益率差距，从而带来人民币贬值和资本外流的风险。

The LPR, which banks normally charge their best clients, is set by 18 designated commercial banks who submit proposed rates to the central bank every month.翻译:LPR 是银行通常向其最佳客户收取的费用，由 18 家指定商业银行制定，每月向央行提交建议利率。
